core.heading: Estimate how much you could get
core.incomeLabel: Include money you get from work, State Pension and any other taxable income you have. Find out more information on what other income is taxable. (opens in a new window)
core.potText: How much is in your pot?
core.cashChunkText: How much do you want to take as your first cash chunk?
core.callOutText: If the total value of your pensions, including those you’ve already taken money from, is close to or more than £1 million, your tax-free amount might be different. If you’re in this situation, it’s important to get regulated financial advice before you access your pension. Find a retirement adviser. (opens in a new window)
core.potLabel: Your pot could be worth this much over the next 5 years:
core.resultsHeader: If you take £%FIRST_CHUNK% from your £%POT% pot, you could get:
core.updateChunkLabel: or try a different cash chunk:
core.resultInfo: This is an estimate — the exact amount of tax you pay depends on your total income for the year and your tax rate
core.incomeErrorLabel: What is your yearly income? - Enter a figure
core.potErrorLabel: How much is in your pot? - Enter a figure
core.potZeroErrorLabel: How much is in your pot? - Amount must be at least £1
core.cashChunkErrorLabel: How much do you want to take as your first cash chunk? - Enter a figure
core.chunkLessThanPotErrorLabel: How much do you want to take as your first cash chunk? - Amount must be less than your pension pot value
core.chunkLessThanPotFieldLevelErrorLabel: Amount must be less than your pension pot value
